attributes.action: examine the current pricing of petrol in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last year oil prices almost hit $150 per barrel and an average cost of one litre of un-leaded petrol was £1.10.Today prices of oil are around  $50 per barrel however unleaded petrol on the forecourts is approx £1.11 per litre and is showing signs of following a gentle incline upwards!
Petrol companies along with the Uk government through taxation on fuel are quite clearly extorting the public and this should not be allowed to continue.
